solution.description: WIKI_START === Purpose === Runs the cefit CKA solution ===

transform.input: SELECT CURRENTDATE, 86400 AS seconds, Rain AS RainAndIrr, Irradiation/1000 as SradiationMJ, (0.6108*EXP(17.27*AirTemperatureMax/(AirTemperatureMax+237.3)) + 0.6108*EXP(17.27*(AirTemperatureMin)/(AirTemperatureMin+237.3)))*0.5 AS e_s, 0.6108*EXP(17.27*AirTemperatureMin/(AirTemperatureMin+237.3)) AS e_a, (AirTemperatureMin+AirTemperatureMax)* 0.5 AS AirTemperatureMean, AirTemperatureMax, AirTemperatureMin FROM weather
